page.shortlink: api desktop api a5 genie heading html function
page.description: Allows you to create dialog boxes that look like Microsoft Wizard dialogs. Creates a white band with an image and text at the top that can be displayed in an embedded window on a parent dialog box.
page.syntax: V a5_GenieHeadingHTML(C windowname ,C imagename ,C text [,C width[,C height ]])
